# Vendored Dependencies

Unmodified source distributions for static linking.

## Libraries

- **pcre2-10.47** - BSD-3-Clause - See `pcre2-10.47/LICENCE.md`
- **glib-2.86.1** - LGPL-2.1+ - See `glib-2.86.1/COPYING`
- **readline-8.3** - GPL-3.0+ - See `readline-8.3/COPYING`
- **ncurses-6.5** - MIT/X11 - See `ncurses-6.5/COPYING`

Run `make` to build all dependencies.
